thread.title: Client Support Specialist - Sports Media

title: Client Support Specialist - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Client Support Specialist Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Respond to inbound correspondence, both through email and by phone, from course clients related to the operations and administration of our product.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
